00047 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_PreProcessor_LoadDefaultValues extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractPreProcessor {
00048 
00049         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00050                 $this->gp = $gp;
00051 
00052                 foreach ($settings as $step => $stepSettings){
00053                         $step= preg_replace('/\.$/', '', $step);
00054 
00055                         if ($step == 1){
00056                                 $this->loadDefaultValuesToGP($stepSettings);
00057                         } elseif(is_numeric($step)) {
00058                                 $this->loadDefaultValuesToSession($stepSettings, $step);
00059                         }
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 return $this->gp;
00063         }
00064 
00072         function loadDefaultValuesToGP($settings) {
00073 
00074                 if (is_array($settings)) {
00075                         foreach (array_keys($settings) as $fN) {
00076                                 $fN = preg_replace('/\.$/', '', $fN);
00077 
00078                                 if (!isset($this->gp[$fN])) {
00079                                         if($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'] && $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']) {
00080                                                 $this->gp[$fN] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'],$settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']);
00081                                         } elseif($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']) {
00082                                                 $this->gp[$fN] = $this->cObj->TEXT($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']);
00083                                         } elseif ($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'] || $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'] == 0) {
00084                                                 $this->gp[$fN] = $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'];
00085                                         }
00086                                                 
00087                                 }
00088                         }
00089                 }
00090         }
00091 
00099         private function loadDefaultValuesToSession($settings,$step){
00100 
00101                 session_start();
00102 
00103                 if (is_array($settings) && $step) {
00104                         foreach (array_keys($settings) as $fN) {
00105                                 $fN = preg_replace('/\.$/', '', $fN);
00106                                 if (!isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$step][$fN])) {
00107                                         if($settings[$fN.'.']['defaultValue'] && $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']) {
00108                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$step][$fN] =  $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'],$settings[$fN.'.']['defaultValue.']);
00109                                         } elseif($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue.']) {
00110                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$step][$fN] =  $this->cObj->TEXT($settings[$fN.'.']['defaultValue.']);
00111                                         } elseif ($settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'] || $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'] == 0) {
00112                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$step][$fN] =  $settings[$fN . '.']['defaultValue'];
00113                                         }
00114                                                 
00115                                 }
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118 
00119         }
00120 }
